name: BLASK
description: BLASK is a unique puzzle game where you control the environment in order to hit all the goal markers with lasers.
minimum_requirements: 最低配置: 操作系统: Windows XP/Vista/7/8/8.1/10 x86/x64 处理器: Intel Pentium D 830 (2* 3000) or equivalent / AMD Athlon 64 4000+ (2600) or equivalent 内存: 1 GB RAM 图形: GeForce 7600 GS (256 MB) / Radeon HD 2400 PRO (256 MB) 存储空间: 需要 50 MB 可用空间
